alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 09 at 12:12PM CST until January 09 at 1:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Clarke County in east central Mississippi... * Until 115 PM CST. * At 1212 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Orange, or 13 miles west of Quitman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Quitman around 1235 PM CST. Middleton around 1245 PM CST. Sykes around 1250 PM CST. Snell around 100 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Pachuta. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
